iconId.Wiki: The menu icon ID to use for this skill.

behaviorId.Wiki: The behavior ID to use for this skill.

NecessityStr.Wiki: The minimum value of Strength required to use this skill.

NecessityDex.Wiki: The minimum value of Dexterity required to use this skill.

NecessityMag.Wiki: The minimum value of Intelligence required to use this skill.

NecessityFai.Wiki: The minimum value of Faith required to use this skill.

consumeSoul.Wiki: The amount of souls consumed when using this skill.

sortId.Wiki: The menu ordering for this skill.

slotLength.Wiki: The slot usage for this skill.
